name: GG Greed
description:
GG Greed is an arcade game about clicking on coins and beating your highscore.

Inspired by flappy bird and other endless games, this game is meant to be a little bit tough.

You can play the game from your browser in this page or download it on Google Play. Make sure to leave your feedback and suggestions below.

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com). Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

You can NOT redistribute this game.

Thank you for playing!
